special_text:
I – Create a 1/1 colorless Construct Actor token.
II – Create a Food token and a Weapon token. [i](A Weapon token is an Equipment with equip {2} and “Equipped creature gets +1/+1.”)[/i]
III – You may draw a card. If you don’t and you control five or more tokens, you may exile The Disappearance and return a card from your graveyard to your hand.
